Title: Musings of a Cigarette Smoking Man
Plot: Frohike pieces together and recites to Mulder and Scully what could be the possible life story of the Cigarette Smoking Man; from a young captain in the U.S. Army recruited to assassinate President Kennedy, to becoming the mysterious man in the shadows at the height of a global conspiracy. What measures will the Cigarette Smoking Man take to ensure that he remains a mystery forever?
GuestStars: Paul Jarrett, Dan Zukovic, Peter Hanlon, Dean Aylesworth, David Fredericks, Laurie Murdoch, Michael St. John Smith, Marc Baur, Jude Zachary, Gonzalo Canton, Steve Oatway, Colin Lawrence, Anthony Ashbee, Pete Mele
